title: For my Yu
text:
If I didn't ..^600see you that day
       I think I^600won't^200be so sad
       so sad
       won't^200be cry
       But^600If^200won't meet you
       I won't^200know^600so happy
       so^200soft
       so^200lovely
       so^200warm
       so^200happy^200feeling
       ^600Can you forgive me?^600I love u!
